name: ZEXAL Construction
text: Reveal 1 card in your hand, and if you do, add 1 "ZW -" monster, "ZS -" monster, "ZEXAL" Spell/Trap, "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell, or "Rank-Down-Magic" Spell from your Deck to your hand, then shuffle the revealed card into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "ZEXAL Construction" per turn.
